word: チャック、ファスナー、ジッパー
すばらしい、素晴らしい

meaning: width, breadth, free room, difference (between two substances) (haba)
which direction, thing, person, or place (dochira, docchi)
volitional ending [う for u-verbs, よう for ru-verbs]: "Let's…" or "I will" (u, yō)

word: じどうはんばいき、自動販売機

meaning: topic marker (wa) [although ha is the hiragana used, wa is the pronunciation)

word: あした、あす、みょうにち、明日

meaning: to wake, to become sober, to be disillusioned (sameru)
to split intoin, to be divided (wakareru)
to rest, to take a break, to go to bed (yasumu)
to raise or extend one's hands (sasu)
to partin, to separatein, to break upin (wakareru)
to harden, to solidify, to become firm (katamaru)
to grow cold, to get chilly, to cool down (hieru)
to exchange, to substitute, to replace (kaeru)
to console, to consolate, to provide empathy (nagusameru)
to celebrate, to be jubilant, to have joy, to have delight, to have rapture (yorokobu)

word: かなしむ、悲しむ、哀しむ

meaning: to be filled, to be surrounded, to overflow (umaru)
to be disturbed, to become confused (midareru)
to be disinterested, to be bored, to be tired of, to be weary (akiru)
to be buried, to be covered (umoreru)
to be astonished, to be surprised, to be scared (odoroku)
to (e) [Note: へ is normally read he, but when used as this particle its reading changes to e]
this direction, thing, person, or place (kochira, kocchi)
things like <list of things>, including, such things as (dano)
the copula particle used after quasi-adjectives (na)
that direction, thing, person, or place over there (achira, acchi)
that direction, thing, person, or place (sochira, socchi)
te form of verb or adjective [see explanation]

word: すぺいんご、スペイン語
さみしい、寂しい、淋しい
えんぴつけずり、鉛筆削り

meaning: passive verb ending [れる for u-verbs, られる for ru-verbs]: to be <verbed> [e.g., 食べられる, "to be eaten"] (reru, rareru)
particle indicating that the speaker is trying to recall some information ["What class is next -kke?"] (-kke)
ongoing occurrence (tsutsu) [similar to ながら but has different tone, and both actions have equal weight]

word: いっしゅうかん、一週間
さびしい、寂しい、淋しい
ちょうせんご、朝鮮語、かんこくご、韓国語
にほんご、日本語 （こくご、国語）

meaning: informal negative (nai, n) [ん is a slurred version and sounds a little masculine]
indicates that it seems the verb occurs; also used to ask whether the verb occurs (darō)
indicates that it seems the verb occurs [e.g., "It seems he ate"] (sōda)
I, myself (ore, mainly used by males [informal])
I, myself (boku, mainly used by males)
I, myself (atashi, mainly used by females [softer sounding])

word: はいいろ、灰色、ねずみいろ、鼠色
ふらんすご、フランス語

meaning: emphasis and question marker, equivalent to "right?" (ne)

word: しかい、歯科医、はいしゃ、歯医者
いとこ、従兄弟、従姉妹、従兄、従弟、従姉、従妹
つりせん、釣り銭、おつり、お釣り
センチメートル、センチ

meaning: causative ending [せる for u-verbs, させる for ru-verbs]: to make [someone do something], to allow (seru, saseru)
casual topic marker (ttara) [colloquial form of to ittara (if you refer to ~; as for ~)

word: くるま、車 (じどうしゃ、自動車)

meaning: bill [of money, e.g., a thousand-yen bill] (satsu)

word: バナナ、かんしょう、甘蕉

meaning: archaic informal negative ["he hath", "thou didst", etc.] (nu)

word: くうこう、空港 （ひこうじょう、飛行場）

meaning: (particle used to indicate that what precedes it is an extreme example and strongly negates it) (dokoro)
